title: Dubai Desert Adventure - 3 Days
description: Experience the thrill of the Arabian Desert with dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional Bedouin camp experiences. Perfect for adventure seekers looking for authentic desert culture.
exclusions: City transfers (if not staying in Dubai)

activities.name: Dune Bashing
activities.description: Thrilling 4WD ride over sand dunes with experienced drivers

activities.name: Camel Trekking
activities.description: Traditional camel rides through the desert landscape

activities.name: Bedouin Camp Experience
activities.description: Overnight stay in traditional desert camp with cultural activities

activities.name: Sandboarding
activities.description: Surf the sand dunes on specially designed boards

itinerary.title: Desert Safari & Camp Setup
itinerary.description: Pickup from Dubai in the afternoon. Drive to desert location. Thrilling dune bashing session. Camel ride at sunset. Arrive at Bedouin camp. Traditional welcome with Arabic coffee and dates. BBQ dinner with live entertainment including belly dancing and fire shows.

itinerary.title: Desert Activities & Culture
itinerary.description: Early morning sunrise photography session. Traditional breakfast. Sandboarding activities. Falconry demonstration. Learn about desert survival techniques. Henna painting session. Traditional lunch. Afternoon rest. Evening cultural programs and stargazing.

itinerary.title: Morning Desert Walk & Return
itinerary.description: Early morning desert walk and bird watching. Final breakfast in the desert. Pack up camp. Scenic drive back to Dubai with photo stops. Drop-off at Dubai location.

fitness_requirements: Moderate fitness required for sandboarding and camel riding. Some activities may not be suitable for pregnant women or people with back problems.

altitude_profile.difficulty_level: Moderate adventure activities in desert environment

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 5 days before departure
